details.arabic_diacless: أفطر عندكم الصائمون، وأكل طعامكم الأبرار، وصلت عليكم الملائكة
details.arabic: أَفْطَرَ عِنْدَكُمُ الصَّائِمُوْنَ، وَأَكَلَ طَعَامَكُمُ الْأَبْرَارُ، وَصَلَّتْ عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ
details.translations: With you, those who are fasting have broken their fast, you have fed those who are righteous, and the angels recite their prayers upon you.
details.reference: Abu Dawud 3/367, Ibn Majah 1/556, An-Nasa'i, 'Amalul-Yawm wal-Laylah 296-8. Al-Albani graded it authentic in Sahih Abu Dawud 2/730.

pageTitle: When breaking fast in someone's home
